title: Blueliner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -  Target two players during the day and **Blueline** them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  When players are **Bluelined**, they will be prompted at the start of the next night to choose one of three paths, simply Path 1, Path 2 and Path 3. If your two targets don't choose the same path, they're both roleblocked and you learn their roles. Evil roles targeted by this ability won't be affected by the roleblock.
-  The second time you roleblock any player, you'll attack them as well.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Good faction lose the game.

desc:
Post 2692
*Let's have regrets. This was one of several paths.*
